name: Asteroid Miner (Netråm)
description:
Play game here! The gyroscope didn't work in embedded pages.

In a far away future you have your own space station working as an asteroid miner to achieve your dream of owning a dog.

Tilt your device to move and tap the screen to mine asteroids.
When at the station you can tap the screen to repair it using resources you've gathered from the asteroids.

Works best on phones or tablets!
